name: Node Load Z Parameter
description: Set the Z parameter of an node load as an optimization parameter.

inputParameters.name: node_key
inputParameters.description: The key of a COMPAS CEM origin node.

inputParameters.name: bound_low
inputParameters.description: The lower bound of the node optimization parameter. Its value is calculated as the initial node parameter minus the absolute value of this bound. Defaults to '-inf'.

inputParameters.name: bound_up
inputParameters.description: The upper bound of the node optimization parameter. Its value is calculated as the initial node parameter plus the absolute value of this bound. Defaults to '+inf'.

outputParameters.name: parameter
outputParameters.description: A COMPAS CEM node load Z parameter.
